scenario.name: Avaya SBCE outbound call (mono)
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port];transport=[transport] SIP/2.0 Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, OPTIONS, BYE, INFO, UPDATE,REFER Contact: "H323 User 1" <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport];+sip.src> From: "H323 User 1" <sip:13035381001@[local_ip]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To:<sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port];transport=[transport]> Require: siprec User-to-User: 00FA080001000758A20EFA;encoding=hex P-Asserted-Identity: "H323 User 1" <sip:13035381001@[local_ip]:[local_port]> CSeq: 50 INVITE Call-ID: [call_id] Diversion: "H323 User 1" <sip:13035381001@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;reason=direct;screen=no;privacy=off;counter=1 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Supported: replaces, 100rel Max-Forwards: 69 Content-Type: multipart/mixed;boundary=foobar Content-Length:[len]
--foobar Content-Type: application/sdp
v=0 o=- 12756 1 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=Session c=IN IP4 [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 0 8 18 101 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:18 G729/8000 a=fmtp:18 annexb=no a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-15 a=label:10 a=sendonly
--foobar Content-Type: application/rs-metadata+xml Content-Disposition: recording-session
